rows.label: tev010901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev010901_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Christopher for advice on
how to overpower your foes.

rows.label: tev010901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev010901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Christopher about recent developments.

rows.label: tev010901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Christopher about Skells.

rows.label: tev010901_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Christopher about Skell combat.

rows.label: tev010901_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Christopher about the device Lin is making.

rows.label: tev010901_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Christopher about the Skell flight module.

rows.label: tev010901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Christopher about recent developments.

rows.label: tev010901_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Christopher about recent developments.

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0001
rows.name:
When you're battling a nasty indigen,
the trick is to immobilize it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Stagger your target with a well-timed combo,
then topple it with a special attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0003
rows.name:
Once it's down, you can unleash your most powerful
attacks with flawless accuracy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you're using a Skell, once you've staggered an
enemy, try binding it instead. This causes even greater
results than if you had merely toppled it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0005
tev010901_MSG0011
rows.name:
When you're battling a nasty indigen,
the trick is to immobilize it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0012
rows.name:
Stagger your target with a well-timed combo,
then topple it with a special attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Once it's down, you can unleash your most powerful
attacks with flawless accuracy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0014
rows.name:
If you're using a Skell, once you've staggered an
enemy, try binding it instead. This causes even greater
results than if you had merely toppled it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Of course, I'm one of relatively few BLADEs who has
been proven worthy to pilot a Skell. What a delight it
would be to have a lady as lovely as yourself join me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0021
rows.name:
A fine question. And I am just the man to answer it,
as I have already purchased the Skell of my dreams.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0022
rows.name:
And I'm not talking about one of those hideous,
soulless hunks of steel BLADE issues to common grunts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0023
rows.name:
My beloved Aphrodite is a work of art, so beautifully
and lavishly customized as to be in a league of her
own so far as BLADE Skells are concerned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0024
rows.name:
All of her components have been custom-ordered from
the finest engineers in the business. They cost a pretty
penny, but I spare no expense on the ones I love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0025
rows.name:
When I see the way the light sparkles off Aphrodite's
chassis, I know I've done right by her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0026
rows.name:
Now if you'll excuse me, I am off to trek across Mira
in Aphrodite's tender bosom, eradicating vile
potamuses all the while![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0034
rows.name:
What? Seriously? What kind of self-respecting man
doesn't have a Skell license of his own?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0035
rows.name:
Do you think any woman in New LA is going to look
at you twice if you don't have a Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0036
rows.name:
Why don't you man up and go ask Commander
Vandham if you can take the licensing test already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0037
rows.name:
Then again, I don't know how much getting a license
would help the likes of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0038
rows.name:
Women love me because everything I am and do is a
work of art. You, on the other hand...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0041
rows.name:
My dearest flower, am I to understand that you do not
yet possess a Skell license?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0042
rows.name:
Perhaps you should go speak to Commander Vandham
and ask him to let you take the licensing test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0043
rows.name:
Dear me, what's this? The way you gaze upon me...
Have you fallen head over heels for me already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0044
rows.name:
While I could give you a great many things, I'm afraid
that my Skell license is not among them. Forgive me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0052
rows.name:
As a veteran Skell pilot, allow me to share some advice
on how to comport yourself with proper grace upon the
battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0053
rows.name:
You'll earn little experience from battling foes that are
smaller than your Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0054
rows.name:
If you wish to polish your own fighting skills,
you should exit your Skell and do battle on foot.
It is the far more efficient way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0055
rows.name:
In other words, there is no poetry in tormenting a
smaller foe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0056
rows.name:
As a fellow man, I expect to see you engaging in fair
fights on the ground, not sullying your Skell with
uncouth bullying of the weak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0059
rows.name:
As a veteran Skell pilot, allow me to share some advice
on how to comport yourself with proper grace upon the
battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0060
rows.name:
You'll earn little experience from battling foes that are
smaller than your Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0061
rows.name:
If you wish to polish your own fighting skills,
you should exit your Skell and do battle on foot.
It is the far more efficient way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0062
rows.name:
In other words, there is no poetry in tormenting a
smaller foe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0063
rows.name:
It would wound me deeply to see a lady as lovely
as you sully her Skell with uncouth bullying,
rather than engaging in fair fights on the ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1001
rows.name:
I continue to customize my beloved Aphrodite with all
the love and coin I can spare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1002
rows.name:
The way she shines in combat now? Ha ha!
She is many times the machine she was when I first
purchased her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1003
rows.name:
I hope that you, too, will refuse to be satisfied merely
with owning a Skell, and will customize yours for far
greater things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1004
rows.name:
And when you do, we shall take our Skells out together
and eradicate the tyrants that infect this world![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1009
rows.name:
To see our Skells taking flight like angels of heaven...
What a poetic stroke of inspiration has struck our
young Lin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1010
rows.name:
Ah, but what would an ignorant savage like yourself
understand of such poetry?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1011
rows.name:
I understand that Commander Vandham is recruiting
test pilots for our new flying Skells via Mission Control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1012
rows.name:
If you're interested enough in the topic to discuss it with
me, perhaps you should consider accepting the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1017
rows.name:
To see our Skells taking flight like angels of heaven...
Such a poetic stroke of inspiration could only strike
a woman![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1018
rows.name:
As a person of the female persuasion yourself,
I'm sure you're able to appreciate the poetry of what
Lin has accomplished?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1019
rows.name:
I understand that Commander Vandham is recruiting
test pilots for our new flying Skells via Mission Control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1020
rows.name:
If you're interested enough in the topic to discuss it with
me, perhaps you should consider accepting the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1025
rows.name:
Needless to say, I had my beloved Aphrodite upgraded
with a Skell flight module immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1026
rows.name:
Seeing her gliding through the sky, unencumbered by
the bonds of the surface world—what a goddess she
has become![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1027
rows.name:
I must find a way to express the depth of my gratitude
to the engineering team that made this feat possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG1028
rows.name:
Let us flap our steel wings and soar through the skies
together—for now we BLADEs know true freedom![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0064
rows.name:
The goddess of beauty has sent me a goddess of love
from the heavens above.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0065
rows.name:
She brought me the final parts I needed for my
beloved Aphrodite. This is clearly destiny![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0066
rows.name: Oh, how I love you, Dana! You are my true Aphrodite![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0067
rows.name:
Thank you, goddess of beauty!
I will love her for all time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0068
rows.name:
You, listen to me! I have been the victim of a cruel
prank played by that woman, Dana![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0069
rows.name:
I opened what I had been told would be a love letter
from her, but out of the envelope popped two red
thallus antennae![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0070
rows.name:
The mere memory brings the bile to my throat!
Why would that woman do such a thing?
Is she a demon in the service of Beelzebub?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0071
rows.name:
And here I thought the gods had created all women
to love me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010901_MSG0072
rows.name: Well then. Apparently even the gods make mistakes.[ST:wait ]
